verses.verse: And in the seventh <WH7637> month, <WH2320> on the first <WH259> day of the month, <WH2320> ye shall have <WH1961> a holy <WH6944> convocation; <WH4744> ye shall do <WH6213> no <WH3808> <WH3605> servile <WH5656> work: <WH4399> it is <WH1961> a day <WH3117> of blowing the trumpets <WH8643> unto you.

And ye shall offer <WH6213> a burnt offering <WH5930> for a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> unto the LORD; <WH3068> one <WH259> young <WH1121> <WH1241> bullock, <WH6499> one <WH259> ram, <WH352> and seven <WH7651> lambs <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> without blemish: <WH8549>

And their meat offering <WH4503> shall be of flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> three <WH7969> tenth deals <WH6241> for a bullock, <WH6499> and two <WH8147> tenth deals <WH6241> for a ram, <WH352>
And one <WH259> tenth deal <WH6241> for one <WH259> lamb, <WH3532> throughout the seven <WH7651> lambs: <WH3532>
And one <WH259> kid <WH8163> of the goats <WH5795> for a sin offering, <WH2403> to make an atonement <WH3722> for <WH5921> you:

Beside <WH4480> <WH905> the burnt offering <WH5930> of the month, <WH2320> and his meat offering, <WH4503> and the daily <WH8548> burnt offering, <WH5930> and his meat offering, <WH4503> and their drink offerings, <WH5262> according unto their manner, <WH4941> for a sweet <WH5207> savor, <WH7381> a sacrifice made by fire <WH801> unto the LORD. <WH3068>

And ye shall have <WH1961> on the tenth <WH6218> day of this <WH2088> seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320> a holy <WH6944> convocation; <WH4744> and ye shall afflict <WH6031> <WH853> your souls: <WH5315> ye shall not <WH3808> do <WH6213> any <WH3605> work <WH4399> therein:

But ye shall offer <WH7126> a burnt offering <WH5930> unto the LORD <WH3068> for a sweet <WH5207> savor; <WH7381> one <WH259> young <WH1121> <WH1241> bullock, <WH6499> one <WH259> ram, <WH352> and seven <WH7651> lambs <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year; <WH8141> they shall be <WH1961> unto you without blemish: <WH8549>

And their meat offering <WH4503> shall be of flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> three <WH7969> tenth deals <WH6241> to a bullock, <WH6499> and two <WH8147> tenth deals <WH6241> to one <WH259> ram, <WH352>
A several tenth deal <WH6241> <WH6241> for one <WH259> lamb, <WH3532> throughout the seven <WH7651> lambs: <WH3532>

One <WH259> kid <WH8163> of the goats <WH5795> for a sin offering; <WH2403> beside <WH4480> <WH905> the sin offering <WH2403> of atonement, <WH3725> and the continual <WH8548> burnt offering, <WH5930> and the meat offering <WH4503> of it, and their drink offerings. <WH5262>

And on the fifteenth <WH2568> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320> ye shall have <WH1961> a holy <WH6944> convocation; <WH4744> ye shall do <WH6213> no <WH3808> <WH3605> servile <WH5656> work, <WH4399> and ye shall keep <WH2287> a feast <WH2282> unto the LORD <WH3068> seven <WH7651> days: <WH3117>

And ye shall offer <WH7126> a burnt offering, <WH5930> a sacrifice made by fire, <WH801> of a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> unto the LORD; <WH3068> thirteen <WH7969> <WH6240> young <WH1121> <WH1241> bullocks, <WH6499> two <WH8147> rams, <WH352> and fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> lambs <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year; <WH8141> they shall be <WH1961> without blemish: <WH8549>

And their meat offering <WH4503> shall be of flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> three <WH7969> tenth deals <WH6241> unto every <WH259> bullock <WH6499> of the thirteen <WH7969> <WH6240> bullocks, <WH6499> two <WH8147> tenth deals <WH6241> to each <WH259> ram <WH352> of the two <WH8147> rams, <WH352>
And a several tenth deal <WH6241> <WH6241> to each <WH259> lamb <WH3532> of the fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> lambs: <WH3532>

And one <WH259> kid <WH8163> of the goats <WH5795> for a sin offering; <WH2403> beside <WH4480> <WH905> the continual <WH8548> burnt offering, <WH5930> his meat offering, <WH4503> and his drink offering. <WH5262>

And on the second <WH8145> day <WH3117> ye shall offer twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> young <WH1121> <WH1241> bullocks, <WH6499> two <WH8147> rams, <WH352> fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> lambs <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> without spot: <WH8549>

And their meat offering <WH4503> and their drink offerings <WH5262> for the bullocks, <WH6499> for the rams, <WH352> and for the lambs, <WH3532> shall be according to their number, <WH4557> after the manner: <WH4941>

And one <WH259> kid <WH8163> of the goats <WH5795> for a sin offering; <WH2403> beside <WH4480> <WH905> the continual <WH8548> burnt offering, <WH5930> and the meat offering <WH4503> thereof, and their drink offerings. <WH5262>

And on the third <WH7992> day <WH3117> eleven <WH6249> <WH6240> bullocks, <WH6499> two <WH8147> rams, <WH352> fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> lambs <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> without blemish; <WH8549>

And their meat offering <WH4503> and their drink offerings <WH5262> for the bullocks, <WH6499> for the rams, <WH352> and for the lambs, <WH3532> shall be according to their number, <WH4557> after the manner: <WH4941>
And one <WH259> goat <WH8163> for a sin offering; <WH2403> beside <WH4480> <WH905> the continual <WH8548> burnt offering, <WH5930> and his meat offering, <WH4503> and his drink offering. <WH5262>

And on the fourth <WH7243> day <WH3117> ten <WH6235> bullocks, <WH6499> two <WH8147> rams, <WH352> and fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> lambs <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> without blemish: <WH8549>

Their meat offering <WH4503> and their drink offerings <WH5262> for the bullocks, <WH6499> for the rams, <WH352> and for the lambs, <WH3532> shall be according to their number, <WH4557> after the manner: <WH4941>

And one <WH259> kid <WH8163> of the goats <WH5795> for a sin offering; <WH2403> beside <WH4480> <WH905> the continual <WH8548> burnt offering, <WH5930> his meat offering, <WH4503> and his drink offering. <WH5262>

And on the fifth <WH2549> day <WH3117> nine <WH8672> bullocks, <WH6499> two <WH8147> rams, <WH352> and fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> lambs <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> without spot: <WH8549>

And their meat offering <WH4503> and their drink offerings <WH5262> for the bullocks, <WH6499> for the rams, <WH352> and for the lambs, <WH3532> shall be according to their number, <WH4557> after the manner: <WH4941>
And one <WH259> goat <WH8163> for a sin offering; <WH2403> beside <WH4480> <WH905> the continual <WH8548> burnt offering, <WH5930> and his meat offering, <WH4503> and his drink offering. <WH5262>

And on the sixth <WH8345> day <WH3117> eight <WH8083> bullocks, <WH6499> two <WH8147> rams, <WH352> and fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> lambs <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> without blemish: <WH8549>

And their meat offering <WH4503> and their drink offerings <WH5262> for the bullocks, <WH6499> for the rams, <WH352> and for the lambs, <WH3532> shall be according to their number, <WH4557> after the manner: <WH4941>
And one <WH259> goat <WH8163> for a sin offering; <WH2403> beside <WH4480> <WH905> the continual <WH8548> burnt offering, <WH5930> his meat offering, <WH4503> and his drink offering. <WH5262>

And on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> seven <WH7651> bullocks, <WH6499> two <WH8147> rams, <WH352> and fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> lambs <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> without blemish: <WH8549>

And their meat offering <WH4503> and their drink offerings <WH5262> for the bullocks, <WH6499> for the rams, <WH352> and for the lambs, <WH3532> shall be according to their number, <WH4557> after the manner: <WH4941>
And one <WH259> goat <WH8163> for a sin offering; <WH2403> beside <WH4480> <WH905> the continual <WH8548> burnt offering, <WH5930> his meat offering, <WH4503> and his drink offering. <WH5262>
On the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117> ye shall have <WH1961> a solemn assembly: <WH6116> ye shall do <WH6213> no <WH3808> <WH3605> servile <WH5656> work <WH4399> therein:

But ye shall offer <WH7126> a burnt offering, <WH5930> a sacrifice made by fire, <WH801> of a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> unto the LORD: <WH3068> one <WH259> bullock, <WH6499> one <WH259> ram, <WH352> seven <WH7651> lambs <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> without blemish: <WH8549>

Their meat offering <WH4503> and their drink offerings <WH5262> for the bullock, <WH6499> for the ram, <WH352> and for the lambs, <WH3532> shall be according to their number, <WH4557> after the manner: <WH4941>
And one <WH259> goat <WH8163> for a sin offering; <WH2403> beside <WH4480> <WH905> the continual <WH8548> burnt offering, <WH5930> and his meat offering, <WH4503> and his drink offering. <WH5262>

These <WH428> things ye shall do <WH6213> unto the LORD <WH3068> in your set feasts, <WH4150> beside <WH905> your vows, <WH4480> <WH5088> and your freewill offerings, <WH5071> for your burnt offerings, <WH5930> and for your meat offerings, <WH4503> and for your drink offerings, <WH5262> and for your peace offerings. <WH8002>
And Moses <WH4872> told <WH559> <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> according to all <WH3605> that <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH853> Moses. <WH4872>
